messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Creative Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet:
Hi Jason, I have a 15 year old son that is into everything Anime and is looking to
get into an actual anime after school club this year at the high school. I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jason,
I have a 15 year old son that is into everything Anime and is looking to
get into an actual anime after school club this year at the high school. I
am a certified web designer and have dabbled a bit with Flash and Fireworks.
We would be thrilled to see what you have to offer. Thanks for helping!

Sue
-------Original Message-------

From: Jason Holm
Date: 08/11/05 00:32:55
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Creative Unschoolers

Hello all! I'm working on a webzine/comic/animation/games type site
for unschoolers. I was curious if there were anyone (especially
kids) out there who are:

1. Cartoonists
2. Web Designers
3. Flash Animators
4. Musicians (especially whole bands of unschoolers)
5. Writers
6. Game Programmers
7. Other Creative Stuff

Additionally, if there is anyone out there interested in LEARNING
any of those things, let me know. Apart from the music, I've been
doing all those myself, and I just thought it might be better to get
the POV of the target audience and the site's characters involved
rather than just one guy's ideas.

Raw, messy notes on the zine/site:
http://www.daysevenstudios.com/jaleho/lifeclub.htm

My Art:
http://www.daysevenstudios.com/jaleho/
http://jaleho.deviantart.com/

-Jason




"List Posting Policies" are provided in the files area of this group.

Visit the Unschooling website and message boards: <http://www.unschooling
info>

education

education

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Creative Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jason, So glad you are doing this!  I have a 13 year old unschooled daughter who draws anime/manga style everything.  She has an anime self portrait she
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jason,
So glad you are doing this! I have a 13 year old
unschooled daughter who draws anime/manga style
everything. She has an anime self portrait she does.
She would be most happy to meet with you!!! She wants
to draw her own manga sometime.

Christy Aitken

Cally
